alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pulaski and southwestern Rockcastle Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 426 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cains Store, or 15 miles west of Somerset, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Magnum and Nancy around 430 PM EDT. Stab, Pointer, Hogue and Pulaski County Park around 435 PM EDT. Science Hill around 440 PM EDT. Bobtown and Dabney around 445 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Woodstock, Bandy, Valley Oak, Shopville, Level Green, Bromo, Willailla, Quail, Bee Lick, Ottowa and Bloss. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
